page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content:
ABBOTSHAM WESTWARD HO LONDONDERRY AND MORETON PARK ESTATES
situation at N.E.tip of a bay which is part of a more extensive sea area known as Bideford or Barnstaple Bay. There are three main areas of habitation (1) Abbotsham (2) A part of Westward Ho (3) New housing estates at Londonderry Farm and Moreton Park. Otherwise the area is rural and maritime. The climate is equable and the scenery varied and beautiful. The principal occupations are agriculture and tourism. As would be expected large numbers of people retire in the area. Abbotsham and Westward Ho serve as dormitory villages for people who work in Bideford and Barnstaple.
